content: crochet spider web bunting is a quick project these make lovely halloween decorations the pattern is seamless and you start at one end and finish at the other the pattern allows you to crochet as many webs as you would like for a longer bunting the pattern has loops on either side of the bunting for easy hanging you can also refer to the youtube video i made for this pattern gauge not critical finished size my finished size of one spider web is 7 inches bunting with 5 spider webs measures approximately 45 inches long materials yarn sock weight yarn in black and size 10 cotton thread in gray you can substitute any yarn for this pattern and choose the hook size according to the yarn weight hook 2 25 mm crochet hook stitch markers yarn needle scissors you can crochet with any weight yarn and complete this project the size and yardage will be different i hope you will crochet this along with me
